General.Name: Pebblebrook Hotel Trust
General.Description: Pebblebrook Hotel Trust (NYSE: PEB) is a publicly traded real estate investment trust ("REIT") and the largest owner of urban and resort lifestyle hotels and resorts in the United States. The Company owns 46 hotels and resorts, totaling approximately 12,000 guest rooms across 13 urban and resort markets.
General.Address: 4747 Bethesda Avenue, Bethesda, MD, United States, 20814-5422
